CustomField.name: leave_request_monthly_every_day_of_the_month_day_of_the_week
CustomField.label: Monthly - Every Day of the month / day of the week

CustomField.name: leave_request_annually_every_day_of_the_month_day_of_the_week
CustomField.label: Annually - Every day of the month / day of the week of the month

CustomField.name: leave_overall_adjustments_end_date
CustomField.label: End date
CustomField.help_pre: The end date must be in the same year as the start date

CustomField.name: leave_overall_credit_to_year
CustomField.label: To year
CustomField.help_pre: If you specify to year than the total leave is untill that year, even if you fill out infinite.

CustomField.name: leave_overall_credit_infinite
CustomField.label: Infinite
CustomField.help_pre: If it is infinite, it is the same for each year

CustomField.name: leave_overall_credit_total_leave_per_year
CustomField.label: Total leave per year
CustomField.help_pre: Total leave per year must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_adjustments_duration
CustomField.label: Duration
CustomField.help_pre:
Example: 8:00,
Example 2: 6:00.
Duration must be hours and minutes separated by :
Duration of hours that a person work, not the duration that a person not work.

CustomField.name: leave_adjustments_each
CustomField.label: Each
CustomField.help_pre:
Example: Each 2 week monday 8:00,
Example 2: Each 3 month first friday 6:00

CustomField.name: leave_adjustments_day_week_month_year
CustomField.label: Day / Week / Month / Year
CustomField.help_pre:
Example: week,
Example 2: month

CustomField.name: leave_adjustments_on
CustomField.label: On
CustomField.help_pre:
Example: n.v.t,
Example 2: first

CustomField.name: leave_adjustments_day_of_the_week
CustomField.label: Day of the week
CustomField.help_pre:
Example: monday,
Example 2: friday

CustomField.name: leave_credit_to_year
CustomField.label: To year
CustomField.help_pre: If you specify to year than the total leave is untill that year, even if you fill out infinite.

CustomField.name: leave_credit_infinite
CustomField.label: Infinite
CustomField.help_pre: If it is infinite, it valid for any subsequent years

CustomField.name: leave_credit_total_leave_per_year
CustomField.label: Total leave per year
CustomField.help_pre: Total leave per year must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_credit_total_leave_per_year_over
CustomField.label: Total leave per year over
CustomField.help_pre: Total leave per year over must be hours and minutes separated by :, it can also be negative

CustomField.name: leave_general_monday
CustomField.label: Monday
CustomField.help_pre: Monday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_tuesday
CustomField.label: Tuesday
CustomField.help_pre: Tuesday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_wednesday
CustomField.label: Wednesday
CustomField.help_pre: Wednesday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_thursday
CustomField.label: Thursday
CustomField.help_pre: Thursday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_friday
CustomField.label: Friday
CustomField.help_pre: Friday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_saturday
CustomField.label: Saturday
CustomField.help_pre: Saturday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_sunday
CustomField.label: Sunday
CustomField.help_pre: Sunday must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_general_total_leave
CustomField.label: Total leave
CustomField.help_pre: Total leave must be hours and minutes separated by :

CustomField.name: leave_settings_show_all_colleagues_of
CustomField.label: Show all colleagues of
CustomField.help_pre: Show in the calendar all the employees of department or business.

CustomField.name: leave_settings_show_department_head_to
CustomField.label: show department head too
CustomField.help_pre: Show in the calendar the department head of the department.
